wayToRechargeYourMobile: Way to recharge your mobile and make utility bill payments
easierWayToLoadFund: Easier way to load fund via mobile banking, eBanking, credit card, cashpoint
payAtYoutFav: Pay at your favourite onlune stores and shops
buyAirlines: Buy airlines, bus tickets and many more. Get cashback and reward points.
watchTheVideo: Watch the video to learn how to use eSewa
esewaRequired: eSewa requires your mobile number to register your device as an additional security measure.
enjoyMoreVivid: Enjoy a more vivid experience in dark mode
thisWayYouCan: This way you can turn on dark mode from the settings:
enterPhoneMpin: Enter the phone number and MPIN used while registering
